Title: Life
Presenters: War on Cooties: Bringing Nerd Men and Women to the Same Gameboard
Book Description: Victoria Stapels, April Nance, Sunny Smith, Erika Carlson, Eva Galperin
All Day Event: 'From Samus Aran to Princess Peach- equal gender representation in nerd culture has been slim at best. With the way we are already judging each other for who is the most ‘L337’ nerd- it’s no surprise that women are getting even more judgement from the nerd community at large. Where are all the female heroes? The tournament-winning chicks? And why are you judging me for kicking YOUR butt in Super Smash Bros.? No matter your gender- please join in on this hot topic! This panel aims to discuss the social issues- inequality and perks that come with being a geeky lady!'

Title: Film
Presenters: Fighting in the Movies - Chicks That Kick Ass
Book Description: Shannon Marshall, Heather Gutterman, Mary Poirier, Caitlynn Poirier, Eva Galperin
All Day Event: 'Ever wonder if the action in films could happen in real life? Join us as we review and discuss some of the top female fighting scenes in cinema. We will watch movie clips and then examine the hand-to-hand techniques- “prop” fighting- and swordsmanship in each clip.'
